item.title: Proactive Outbound Communication: Pre-Visit, Check-In, and Crisis Response in Long-Term Care Homes
item.description:
If there is one thing that ensures quality in long-term care homes, it is communication. The overlap between residents, caregivers, and families must not be a choice itâ€™s important. Missing calls in the course of a situation when an individual is unwell, an emergency arises, or health updates are on the table makes communication, and consequently the safety, of residents a priority. Communication, from all aspects, is critical.

SeaHealth Voice AI is revolutionizing the operational workflow of care facilities by automating routine calls, check-ins and crisis response. This AI solution manages everything from pre-visit instructions to daily health assessments, which guarantees that no resident is neglected. It alleviates the burden on caregivers, improving operational efficiency and the quality of care provided.
